Home.title: Build your
Home.description: Symply offers the ultimate simplicity for creating unique servers. Unleash your creativity without constraints and build unforgettable game worlds in the blink of an eye.

modal.title: Download
modal.description:
You are about to download Symply,
our beta version application designed to enhance your Minecraft experience.

Please note that Symply is currently in a testing phase, and we cannot guarantee support
for all issues encountered on your Minecraft servers.

As a development team, we encourage you to use Symply cautiously and understand that errors may occur. For more
information about our beta version and to report issues, please
refer to our documentation.
